data.name: Rhythmetallic
data.detailed_description:
Do you love tap rhythm games, but you are tired of the same old pop or EDM music?
Want a rhythm game featuring different heavy metal music with the classic tap tap rhythm gameplay?

Try Rhythmetallic – heavy metal music rhythm game. This tap tap music rhythm game leads you on a fun music tapping adventure filled with original heavy metal music.

With 30+ songs (another 50+ songs if you own the DLC) across different metal genres such as heavy metal, thrash metal, melodic death metal, black metal, power metal and djent), there must be songs that are sure to satisfy your metal taste.

◆ DIVERSE METAL GENRES

Start your Rhythmetallic metal journey and explore multiple heavy metal rhythm genres. Complete them all with the highest score possible and show that you are the #1 tap music master.

◆ CLASSIC RHYTHM GAME

Classic rhythm game mechanics. Feel the rhythm, and be precise just like you are a member of the metal band playing the song.

◆ TOP THE LEADERBOARDS

For an added thrill, our heavy metal song rhythm game features a global leaderboard for rhythm game masters just like you. Top the leaderboard and show that you are a skilful metal guitar player that can match the energy and darkness of heavy metal.

Play Now!

Now it’s time to break out of the ordinary and enjoy a heavy metal music rhythm game.

INCLUDED GENRES:

◉ Heavy metal
◉ Thrash metal
◉ Power metal
◉ Melodic death metal
◉ Black metal
◉ Djent
◉ And more...

data.short_description: Indie rhythm game featuring heavy metal music! New music will be added constantly and the metal journey is waiting for you in Rhythmetallic!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.10
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
